A light and fluffy vanilla cake, the classic birthday cake with sprinkles is simple, but rich in flavor from the vanilla notes. Vanilla is spongy and white and is often the basis of many cakes for various celebrations including tres leches made of vanilla sponge cake. It is filled with a rich, buttercream filling.

Common Toppings on Vanilla cake are:

  • coconut shavings
  • rasberry jam
  • chocolate shavings
  • strawberrries
  • rasberrries
